about_the_game:
If you enjoy EQI please consider supporting us by purchasing the Soundtrack DLC.

"You find yourself in a digital world that twists and changes around you, challenging your senses, focus, and reflexes. Interface with the great mystery and transcend.

Immerse yourself in the electronic pulse of the game's OST!"
